channel.title: Karabiner Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 10.1.7
item.description:
About v10.1.7 Update

  • v10.1.7: Fixed minor issue.
  • v10.1.6: Updated prepared settings.
  • v10.1.5: Updated prepared settings.
  • v10.1.4: Minor improvement.
  • v10.1.3: Improved command line interface.
  • v10.1.2: Added an option to disable AXNotifier. ("AXNotifier" tab in Preferences.)
  • v10.1.1: Improved compatibility with JavaAppLauncher.
Karabiner Web Site
